title: Addition & Subtraction
activityDescription: Students Subitize groups of a dots as a class.
coreSkillDescription: "The Blues Always Make Five" Each shape they see in this lesson will be displayed based on it's relationship to the number five. Students job is to identify this relationship and write the equation Ex: 5-4, 5+2...
standardDescription: Understand the relationship between numbers and quantities; connect counting to cardinality.
